tasks.title: Initialize Project Structure
tasks.description: Set up base files and directories according to the PRD specification.
tasks.details: Create index.html, index_de.html, cards_indiv.html, cards_indiv_de.html, projects_indiv.js, projects_indiv_de.js, and CNAME file. Link Tailwind CSS via CDN in all HTML files.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify file existence and correct CDN links. Check GitHub repository structure matches requirements.

tasks.title: Implement Global Design System
tasks.description: Apply color palette, typography, and base styles across all pages.
tasks.details: Define CSS variables for Alabaster (#FAFAF9), Carbon (#171717), Stone (#78716C) and insight colors. Implement Playfair Display, Plus Jakarta Sans, and JetBrains Mono via CDN. Set base font styles and background colors.
tasks.testStrategy: Visual inspection of color application and font rendering. Use browser dev tools to verify CSS variable usage.

tasks.title: Create SVG Noise Texture
tasks.description: Implement subtle background texture as specified in the design system.
tasks.details: Create SVG noise filter with 3% opacity. Apply as background-image to body element using base64 encoding or external SVG file.
tasks.testStrategy: Visual inspection at different zoom levels to confirm subtle texture presence without visual clutter.

tasks.title: Build Language Switcher Component
tasks.description: Implement pill-shaped language toggle with DE/ENG options.
tasks.details: Create reusable component with active/inactive states. Position top-right on all pages. Implement click handlers to switch between language versions while preserving project ID on detail pages.
tasks.testStrategy: Test navigation between index.html and index_de.html. Verify URL parameters persist on detail pages during language switches.

tasks.title: Implement Hero Section
tasks.description: Create minimalist header with manifesto text and typography.
tasks.details: Use Playfair Display for 'AUGMENT' headline. Center-align manifesto text in constrained column. Ensure no navigation or submit buttons are present.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify typography hierarchy and responsive behavior across breakpoints.

tasks.title: Develop Masonry Grid Layout
tasks.description: Create responsive card grid with large gaps (gap-12).
tasks.details: Implement CSS grid or column layout with Tailwind's gap-12 utility. Ensure cards maintain aspect ratio (4:5) and responsive behavior.
tasks.testStrategy: Test grid responsiveness across devices. Verify gap sizing matches design specs.

tasks.title: Design Generative Card Covers
tasks.description: Create category-based CSS-generated artwork for project cards.
tasks.details: Implement three cover styles: organic radial gradients (finance), structured grid patterns (engineering), and giant typography symbols (code). Use CSS pseudo-elements and background properties.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify visual differentiation between categories. Test rendering performance.

tasks.title: Build Insight Card Component
tasks.description: Create reusable project card with floating corners and content areas.
tasks.details: Implement white card with 4:5 aspect ratio. Position publication date badge (top-center) and author attribution (bottom-center). Add triangular corner markers with p-4 padding.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify all content elements render correctly. Check aspect ratio maintenance.

tasks.title: Implement Card Hover Effects
tasks.description: Add elevation and corner animation on card hover.
tasks.details: Create CSS transitions for card lift (transform: translateY) and corner marker scale-up. Add tooltip showing persona message on hover.
tasks.testStrategy: Hover test on multiple cards. Verify smooth animations and tooltip positioning.

tasks.title: Create Firefly Animation System
tasks.description: Implement random corner pulsing effect across card grid.
tasks.details: Use JavaScript to select random card corners every 3-5 seconds. Animate glow intensity (opacity) via CSS keyframes. Ensure animation restarts seamlessly.
tasks.testStrategy: Observe animation pattern over 2+ minutes. Verify no performance issues.

tasks.title: Develop Footer Component
tasks.description: Implement asymmetric footer with 'READY TO BUILD?' typography.
tasks.details: Create split layout with large serif text and monospace link list (LinkedIn, Email). Use JetBrains Mono for technical links.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify visual balance and link functionality. Check responsive behavior.

tasks.title: Implement Project Data Loading
tasks.description: Load and parse projects_indiv.js data for rendering.
tasks.details: Create data loader function that accesses window.PROJECTS. Handle potential loading errors and empty states.
tasks.testStrategy: Test with valid/invalid data structures. Verify error handling.

tasks.title: Build Detail Page Routing
tasks.description: Handle project-specific detail view navigation.
tasks.details: Parse window.location.search for ?id parameter. Match against projects array and render corresponding content. Implement 404 handling for invalid IDs.
tasks.testStrategy: Test URL parameter handling with valid/invalid IDs. Verify content rendering accuracy.

tasks.title: Create Detail Page Header
tasks.description: Implement title, like button, and 4-insight grid.
tasks.details: Position like button top-right. Display all four insight messages in a grid layout using their respective colors.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify insight message rendering and color coding. Test like button positioning.

tasks.title: Develop Methodology Flow Section
tasks.description: Implement narrative sections (Prompt, Pivot, Implementation, Refinement).
tasks.details: Create sequential content blocks with appropriate headings. Implement thick dashed separator for Tech Stack section.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify content hierarchy and separator styling. Check responsive layout.

tasks.title: Integrate CounterAPI for Likes
tasks.description: Connect respect button to global like counter.
tasks.details: Implement fetch calls to counterapi.dev (namespace: mkn501-symbiosis). Handle optimistic UI updates and error fallbacks.
tasks.testStrategy: Test like increments persist across sessions. Verify offline handling.

tasks.title: Implement Open Graph Metadata
tasks.description: Add social sharing tags for proper link previews.
tasks.details: Include og:title, og:description, and og:image meta tags. Dynamically update for project detail pages.
tasks.testStrategy: Use sharing debuggers (Facebook, LinkedIn) to verify correct metadata.

tasks.title: Create Data Schema Validator
tasks.description: Ensure projects_indiv.js matches required JSON structure.
tasks.details: Build runtime validation using JSON schema or manual checks. Console warn on mismatches during development.
tasks.testStrategy: Intentionally break schema to verify error detection.

tasks.title: Optimize Responsive Behavior
tasks.description: Ensure proper rendering across mobile and desktop viewports.
tasks.details: Implement media queries for grid layout, typography scaling, and component spacing. Test touch targets for mobile.
tasks.testStrategy: Device testing using Chrome DevTools. Verify no horizontal scrolling.

tasks.title: Configure GitHub Pages Deployment
tasks.description: Set up automatic deployment via GitHub Actions.
tasks.details: Create deployment workflow that pushes build artifacts to gh-pages branch. Enable HTTPS enforcement.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify live deployment matches local build. Check HTTPS enforcement.

tasks.title: Implement DNS Configuration
tasks.description: Set up Namecheap DNS records for custom domain.
tasks.details: Create A records pointing to GitHub IPs and CNAME for www subdomain. Remove default redirects/parking.
tasks.testStrategy: Use dig command to verify DNS propagation. Check domain accessibility.

tasks.title: Create Cache Busting Mechanism
tasks.description: Prevent stale content issues during updates.
tasks.details: Implement version query strings for CSS/JS files (style.css?v=2). Add cache-control headers via .htaccess.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify updated files load immediately after deployment.

tasks.title: Implement Cross-Browser Testing
tasks.description: Ensure compatibility with major browsers.
tasks.details: Test on Chrome, Firefox, Safari and Edge. Address vendor-specific CSS issues.
tasks.testStrategy: Visual regression testing across browsers. Check functionality consistency.

tasks.title: Develop Local Testing Server Setup
tasks.description: Create script for local development with live reload.
tasks.details: Implement Node.js server with express or python -m http.server. Add start script to package.json.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify API calls work locally without CORS errors.

tasks.title: Document Git Workflow
tasks.description: Create contributor guidelines for repository management.
tasks.details: Document rebase workflow: git pull --rebase origin main before pushing. Add .gitignore for OS files.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify new contributors can successfully clone and push changes.
